DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this follow-up retrospective study is to evaluate the long term efficacy and safety of rosuvastatin in reducing lipid parameters in clinical practice.
DOC.brief_title: Registry On Efficacy and Safety Of Rosuvastatin, and Atorvastatin and Simvastatin In Hypercholesterolaemia
DOC.criteria: Primary hypercholesterolemia Subjects from first rosuvastatin Registry study
